languages.text: "Я видел, как ты рисуешь кровавые лабиринты и пляшешь в них с клинками. Неизящно, но направление верное. Показать тебе как надо?"
"I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"
languages.original_text: "Я видел, как ты рисуешь кровавые лабиринты и пляшешь в них с клинками. Неизящно, но направление верное. Показать тебе как надо?"

traits.locale_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"
"I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"
"I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"
"I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"
"I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

languages.text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie Ihr Labyrinthe aus Blut malt und mit wirbelnden Klingen darin tanzt. Krude, doch die Absicht ist gut. Darf ich Euch zeigen, wie es richtig gemacht wird?"
languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie Ihr Labyrinthe aus Blut malt und mit wirbelnden Klingen darin tanzt. Krude, doch die Absicht ist gut. Darf ich Euch zeigen, wie es richtig gemacht wird?"

languages.text: « Je vous ai vue tracer des labyrinthes de sang et danser en leur sein dans un tourbillon de lames. Une pratique grossière, mais l'intention y est. Voulez-vous que je vous montre comment on s'y prend ? »
languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai vue tracer des labyrinthes de sang et danser en leur sein dans un tourbillon de lames. Une pratique grossière, mais l'intention y est. Voulez-vous que je vous montre comment on s'y prend ? »

languages.text: «Te he visto trazar laberintos de sangre y bailar en ellos con tus espadas. Burdo, pero el concepto es bueno. ¿Te enseño cómo se hace de verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

traits.locale_text: «Te he visto trazar laberintos de sangre y bailar en ellos con tus espadas. Burdo, pero el concepto es bueno. ¿Te enseño cómo se hace de verdad?».

languages.text: 「お前が血の迷宮を描き、その中で刃を回転させて踊るのを見たことがある。粗野だが、その意図は正しい。正しい方法を教えてやろうか？」
languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前が血の迷宮を描き、その中で刃を回転させて踊るのを見たことがある。粗野だが、その意図は正しい。正しい方法を教えてやろうか？」

languages.text: “我看到你用鲜血画出了迷宫一样的图案，用旋转的利刃在迷宫中跳舞。虽然你做得很粗糙，但你的意图还不赖。要不要我亲自向你示范一下？”
languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

traits.locale_text: “我看到你用鲜血画出了迷宫一样的图案，用旋转的利刃在迷宫中跳舞。虽然你做得很粗糙，但你的意图还不赖。要不要我亲自向你示范一下？”

languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"

languages.text: "Kandan labirentler çizdiğini ve savrulan kılıçlar eşliğinde bu labirentlerde dans ettiğini gördüm. İlkel bir hareket olsa da maksadı yerinde. Sana nasıl yapman gerektiğini gösterebilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "I have seen you draw labyrinths of blood and dance in them with whirling blades. Crude, but the intent is sound. Shall I show you how it ought to be done?"
